name: Hippowdon LV.X
author: Shizurow

poke_power.name: Sand Reset
poke_power.effect: Once during a game on your turn (before your attack), each player shuffles all cards in play (excluding Pokémon and Supporter cards) into his or her deck. You can’t use more than 1 Sand Reset Poké-Power each game.

attacks.name: Double Shoot
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {F} Energy attached to Hippowdon and choose 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to each of them. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Hippowdon. Hippowdon LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
